title: Volume of bottled water in the U.S. 2010 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in billion dollars, containing a total of 13 data points.
Overall Sales volume in billion dollars has increased over the Year.
Sales volume in billion dollars is roughly increasing from 2006 to 2007, roughly constant from 2007 to 2009, and finally gradually increasing from 2009 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2015 and 2016.
The highest Sales volume in billion dollars, of value 13.85 was reached at Year 2018
The lowest Sales volume in billion dollars, of value 8.25 was reported at Year 2006
